name: Search Functionality Test
description: Verify that the search feature returns relevant results in a timely manner
prerequisites: User account with access to search feature, test data in the system

steps.action: Log in to the Audotics application with a test account
steps.expected: Login succeeds and user is redirected to the dashboard
steps.notes: Use test account test-user-3@audotics.com with password Test1234!

steps.action: Locate and click on the search bar/icon in the application header
steps.expected: Search input is focused and ready for text entry
steps.notes: Typically found in the top navigation bar

steps.action: Enter a simple, common search term (e.g., 'rock')
steps.expected: Search results appear, categorized by type (artists, songs, playlists, etc.)
steps.notes: Results should appear as you type (after 3+ characters)

steps.action: Verify that search results load within acceptable time
steps.expected: Initial results should appear within 1 second of typing pause
steps.notes: Use a stopwatch or the browser dev tools to measure time

steps.action: Check that results are categorized appropriately
steps.expected: Results are organized into clear categories (Artists, Songs, Albums, Playlists, Users)
steps.notes: Each category should have a clearly labeled heading

steps.action: Test partial word search (e.g., 'beat' instead of 'beatles')
steps.expected: System returns relevant results that contain the partial term
steps.notes: Should match beginning, middle, or end of words

steps.action: Test misspelled search term (e.g., 'beattles' instead of 'beatles')
steps.expected: System suggests correction or returns results for the correct spelling
steps.notes: Look for 'Did you mean...' or similar suggestion

steps.action: Test search with special characters (e.g., 'AC/DC' or 'P!nk')
steps.expected: System correctly handles special characters and returns relevant results
steps.notes: No errors should appear in the console

steps.action: Click on 'Show all results' or equivalent to view full search results page
steps.expected: Full search results page loads with more comprehensive results and filtering options
steps.notes: Check page load time - should be under 2 seconds

steps.action: Test filter functionality by selecting a specific category (e.g., 'Artists' only)
steps.expected: Results are filtered to show only the selected category
steps.notes: The filter should apply immediately without page reload

steps.action: Test sort functionality if available (e.g., sort by relevance, popularity, date)
steps.expected: Results are reordered according to the selected sort option
steps.notes: The sort should apply immediately without page reload

steps.action: Perform an advanced search using operators (e.g., 'rock NOT classic')
steps.expected: System interprets operators correctly and returns refined results

steps.action: Test search for non-Latin characters (e.g., 'пятница' or '안녕하세요')
steps.expected: System handles non-Latin characters and returns appropriate results if available

steps.action: Clear the search and enter a term with no expected results
steps.expected: System shows an appropriate 'No results found' message with suggestions
steps.notes: The message should be user-friendly and helpful

steps.action: Check browser history after performing multiple searches
steps.expected: Each distinct search should create a unique URL that can be bookmarked or shared
steps.notes: Use browser back button to verify history navigation works
